text: Patrick Lebreton (born 6 September 1963) was a member of the National Assembly of France from 2007 to 2017, representing the island of Réunion's 4th constituency, as a member of the Socialiste, radical, citoyen et divers gauche. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Socialist Party (France) politicians Category:Mayors of places in Réunion Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Patrick Lebreton
